summary: An immersive, lore-friendly shield aimed at those who desire a little more protection.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=https://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/SkMFU4n.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][youtube]GnprVQ8IRPM[/youtube] [youtube]nsV14ZhHPnc[/youtube][/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/DaHYlPL.jpg[/img]
[b]FEEL FREE TO ADD YOUR OWN SCREENSHOTS![/b]

[b]About[/b]

The Imperial Legion is a large kite shield that depicts the logo of The Imperial Legion. It is a strong shield made for Imperials and Skyrim lovers alike.

Both model and textures were created by me using 3ds Max 2011/2014 and Photoshop CS6.

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b]Â A craftable shield styled for the Imperial Legion.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Obtaining:[/b]

This item is smithed under "Steel" and will require: 1 Leather Strips, 2 Iron Ingot, 4 Steel Ingot and 3 Firewood.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Installation:[/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the files of the archive to your Skyrim Data Folder

imperialshield.esp
meshes/armor/imperialshield
textures/armor/imperialshield

Please remember to enable the .esp after you have installed the files :)

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Remove using Nexus Mod Manager

or

Simply delete the following files/folders:

imperialshield.esp
meshes/armor/imperialshield
textures/armor/imperialshield

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Notes:[/b]

When tempered to Legendary, the shield can be on par with Daedric.

You can download a replacer version @ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45329//?

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod!

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[center][color=yellow][b]Please check out my other mods![/b][/color]
